citation: Proclamation under the Treasury Miscellaneous (Cost of Living and Affordable Housing Support) Act 2021 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Treasury Miscellaneous (Cost of Living and Affordable Housing Support) Act 2021

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2(4) of the Treasury Miscellaneous (Cost of Living and Affordable Housing Support) Act 2021 fix 1 September 2021 as the day on which Part 4 of that Act commences.

9 August 2021

B. BAKER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

Michael Darrel Joseph Ferguson

Minister for Finance

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 13 August 2021

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Treasury and Finance.
